column2:
Thousands of people
started earning with
SJPANEL this week
Register yourself with us and you will receive your login credentials on your registered email Id.
Complete the surveys you get and earn points which can be redeemed as rewards once you have accumulated 2000 points
Once you are registered with us and have confirmed your valid email id,we will send you few profiler surveys to understand your interests and background.
Once you have updated your profile with us, you will start receiving surveys as per your demography and interests with reward points ranging from 100 – 1000 points.
Surveys are more fun, when they come with lots of rewards

SJ panel helps you to share your views and influence decisions making for various day to day products you use in your daily life. In addition to this you will receive exciting rewards for each survey you take to share your views.
We are going to tell you our little secret.

Companies, brands, and organizations from around the globe are constantly seeking the opinions of people just like you to help shape the products they develop and how they market them. They count on paid online surveys to provide them with reliable information. If you spend time online and enjoy giving your opinion, paid surveys are a great way to earn a little extra cash while helping these companies.

SJ Panel is the world’s largest free rewards community. Our members are helping shape the future of products that will be released all around the world. We have relationships with hundreds of brands, who give us thousands of new online surveys a week to provide to you. Your SJ Panel membership is completely free and you can join by filling out the simple registration process. Once you are registered, you can start earning points by completing paid online surveys.
It is Simple and entertaining, I just love giving online surveys with SJ Panel and it gets so much exciting when I receive reward points." 03.02.2018 - Andrew Williams
